Anton's Mindstorms Docs
  • Micropython
  • View page source

We build a number of pre-compiled firmwares that can be flashed on the LMS-ESP32 module. You can The LMS-ESP32 comes pre-flahed with a special version of MicroPython firmware. These versions can be uploaded to your LMS-ESP32 module from within the Web browser on our firmware flashing website.

Micropython

The LMS-ESP32 comes pre-flahed with a special version of MicroPython firmware. This version comes with build-in ulab, LVGL and SerialTalk/UartRemote libraries.

  • ulab-library
  • LVGL library

BluePad32

  • Precompiled binary
  • Installation of ESP-IDF
  • Set-up of IDF-ESP32-Arduino with BluePad32 and UartRemote
  • BluePad32 with Lego Spike Prime or Mindstorms Robot Inventor
